00019 #define _ZCLLINKINFOCLUSTER_H

00027 /*******************************************************************************
00028                    Define(s) section
00029 *******************************************************************************/
00030 /* Maximum amount of attributes */
00031 #define ZCL_LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_CLIENT_SIDE_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT 7
00032 
00033 /* Size of attribute value in octets */
00034 #define ATTR_LENGTH 19
00035 
00036 /* Link info cluster commands amount */
00037 #define ZCL_LINK_INFO_COMMANDS_AMOUNT 1
00038 
00039 /* Link Info cluster server side commands identifiers */
00040 #define ZCL_LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_READY_TO_TRANSMIT_COMMAND_ID 0x00
00041 
00042 /* Defines Attribute type */
00043 #define ZCL_LINK_INFO_ATTRIBUTE(i, j) \
00044   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(linkInfo##j, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, j, ZCL_OCTET_STRING_DATA_TYPE_ID),
00045 
00046 /* Cluster client side attributes */
00047 #define ZCL_DEFINE_LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES() \
00048   REPEAT_MACRO(ZCL_LINK_INFO_ATTRIBUTE, 0, ZCL_LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_CLIENT_SIDE_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT)
00049 
00050 /* Cluster's commands */
00051 #define ZCL_DEFINE_LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(readyToTransmitInd)                            \
00052   DEFINE_COMMAND(readyToTransmitCommand, ZCL_LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_READY_TO_TRANSMIT_COMMAND_ID, \
00053     COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),   \
00054     readyToTransmitInd)
00055 
00056 /* Server side cluster's commands */
00057 #define ZCL_DEFINE_LINK_INFO_SERVER_SIDE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(readyToTransmitInd) \
00058   ZCL_DEFINE_LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(readyToTransmitInd)
00059 
00060 /* Client side cluster's commands */
00061 #define ZCL_DEFINE_LINK_INFO_CLIENT_SIDE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS() \
00062   ZCL_DEFINE_LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(NULL)
00063 
00064 /* Cluster server side definition */
00065 #define LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands)                   \
00066 {                                                                                             \
00067   .id = LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_ID,                                                                 \
00068   .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00069   .attributesAmount = 0,                                            \
00070   .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes,                                                      \
00071   .commandsAmount = ZCL_LINK_INFO_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                                            \
00072   .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands                                                           \
00073 }
00074 
00075 /* Cluster client side definition */
00076 #define LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands)                   \
00077 {                                                                                             \
00078   .id = LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_ID,                                                                 \
00079   .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00080   .attributesAmount = ZCL_LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_CLIENT_SIDE_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,                                                                      \
00081   .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes,                                                      \
00082   .commandsAmount = ZCL_LINK_INFO_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                                            \
00083   .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands                                                           \
00084 }
00085 
00086 /* Cluster definition */
00087 #define DEFINE_LINK_INFO_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00088   LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00089 
00090 /* Defines attribute struct */
00091 #define LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_ATTRIBUTE_STRUCT(i, j) \
00092   struct PACK                                    \
00093   {                                              \
00094     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;                        \
00095     uint8_t type;                                \
00096     uint8_t properties;                          \
00097     uint8_t value[ATTR_LENGTH];                  \
00098   } linkInfo##j;
00099 
00100 /* Defines cluster's attribute set */
00101 #define LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_ATTRIBUTES_SET() \
00102   REPEAT_MACRO(LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_ATTRIBUTE_STRUCT, 0, ZCL_LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_CLIENT_SIDE_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT)
00103 
00104 /*******************************************************************************
00105                    Types section
00106 *******************************************************************************/
00107 BEGIN_PACK
00108 
00109 /* Link Info cluster attribute type */
00110 typedef struct PACK
00111 {
00112   ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00113   uint8_t type;
00114   uint8_t properties;
00115   uint8_t value[ATTR_LENGTH];
00116 } ZclLinkInfoAttr_t;
00117 
00118 /* Link Info cluster attribute value type.
00119    An attribute with string type shall contain its length in the
00120    first byte of the value field. */
00121 typedef struct PACK
00122 {
00123   uint8_t length;
00124   uint8_t payload[];
00125 } ZclLinkInfoAttrValue_t;
00126 
00127 /* Link Info cluster client side attributes */
00128 typedef struct PACK
00129 {
00130   LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_ATTRIBUTES_SET()
00131 } ZCL_LinkInfoClusterClientAttributes_t;
00132 
00133 /* Ready To Transmit command payload */
00134 typedef struct PACK
00135 {
00136   uint8_t boundDevicesAmount;
00137 } ZCL_ReadyToTransmit_t;
00138 
00139 END_PACK
00140 
00141 /*Link Info cluster commands */
00142 typedef struct
00143 {
00144   struct
00145   {
00146     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00147     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00148     ZCL_Status_t (*readyToTransmitCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_ReadyToTransmit_t *payload);
00149   } readyToTransmitCommand;
00150 } ZCL_LinkInfoClusterCommands_t;
